title: The Bravest Thing
teaser: We kick off our new podcast series with a story from host Al Letson, who asks filmmaker Steve Bognar a fairly simple question... but wasn't prepared for his answer.
description:
SOTRU's new podcast series features short stories from host Al  Letson and producers Tina Antolini and Laura Starecheski. From ancillary  stories that SOTRU didn't have time to include in the radio show to  Al's random conversations with strangers, these short podcasts are sure  to entertain, education and enlighten your day. Podcasts will be  released twice a month and also featured on the State of the Re:Union website.
Subscribe to SOTRU's podcasts on iTunes and look for a new podcast every other Monday from Al and our producers, Tina Antolini and Laura Starecheski.
